summary: Sir Joseph John "J.J." Thomson, OM, FRS  was a British physicist and Nobel laureate.
full_text: Francis William Aston FRS  was a British chemist and physicist who won the 1922 Nobel Prize in Chemistry for his discovery, by means of his mass spectrograph, of isotopes, in a large number of non-radioactive elements, and for his enunciation of the whole number rule. He was a fellow of the Royal Society and Fellow of Trinity College, Cambridge.
title: Francis William Aston
